TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsText extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: Rappresenta il contenuto testuale degli elementi della grammatica definiti dallo standard [SRGS (Speech Recognition Grammar Specification) versione 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/) del World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

span.span: Represents the textual content of grammar elements defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
